name: Poly Backrooms
description:
Poly Backrooms is not your typical horror game. Its cartoonish visuals and playful design elements create a stark contrast with the underlying horror, making for a truly unique gaming experience. The game is filled with countless identical rooms, each with their own set of challenges and puzzles. But don't let the fun aesthetics fool you - the further you venture, the more dangerous it becomes.



Poly Backrooms is filled with diverse and entertaining puzzles. From simple to complex, these puzzles are designed to be solved both individually and cooperatively. The solutions change with each new game, ensuring that no two playthroughs are the same.



We're committed to making Poly Backrooms the best backrooms game out there. We have plans to add new entities, levels, puzzles, and items, as well as improve gameplay and add language localization.

Join us in Poly Backrooms, where fun meets fear, and every corner turned could lead to laughter or screams!
